hero.lead: Design, data and strategy to communicate with purpose.
hero.name: Diego Tejera :)

axes.data_desc: I work with data to turn it into clear, solid deliverables. Cleaning, consistency and visualization so what’s published is understandable and defensible.
axes.product_desc: I build digital products that guide and engage. Hierarchy, rhythm and micro-details to make exploration easy and create scalable experiences.
axes.creative_desc: Content with identity and a results-driven focus. Structure, aesthetics and pacing to sustain attention. Formats change, the criteria stays.

sections.about_intro: I hold a degree in <1>Political Science and Public Administration</1> and I work by turning complex information into clear pieces. I’m comfortable with <1>operational work, documentation, case files, regulations, writing and task organization</1>, as well as <1>analysis, statistics, data and visualization</1>.
sections.about_translator: I turn all of that into publishable deliverables, from <1>reports, maps and dashboards to web products</1>. And when the channel is <1>social media</1>, I translate it into content with a sense of format, pacing and distribution, so the message is understood and travels.
sections.about_autodidact: Many of the skills I use today are <1>self-taught</1>. I usually explore new tools on my own, understand their logic and adapt them quickly to what I need. I learn by testing, understanding the system and applying it to real projects.
sections.story_title: I started jumping into things I didn’t know… and figuring out how to make them work
sections.story_desc: I made designs, invented databases and told stories without really knowing why. Years later, I realized I was already building the way I think.
sections.tools_subtitle: I adapt quickly to new tools depending on the team and workflow.
sections.tools_design_desc: High-impact visual content creation and short-form/viral format management.
sections.tools_data_desc: Ability to turn raw data into clear insights for decision-making.
sections.tools_management_desc: Administrative profile with strong organization tools and technical writing.

dentro_del_pleno.desc: An interactive, visual piece conceived as a scrollytelling exercise, summarizing 2025 in the plenary sessions of Spain’s Congress of Deputies.

aforolab.desc: A LaLiga stadium attendance analytics platform with interactive visualizations to compare key metrics across clubs in Spain’s professional football competitions.

kike_perez.desc: Key poster design for the tour and adaptations for different shows and venues, keeping a consistent visual identity.

wordle_canario.desc: A Canary Islands version of the original game, a light everyday project that turned local vocabulary into a shared habit. Guess the word in six tries.

pasion_colchonera.desc: Pasión Colchonera was a branding project for a sports social account, where I developed key identity and visual presence assets, Instagram designs, Twitter banner, profile image and highlights resources.

fondo_segunda.desc: Co-founded Fondo Segunda, a leading outlet for Spain’s Segunda División. Professional editorial design combining design, statistics and opinion pieces. I laid out and worked on the 2019/20 season guide design.

csif.place: Central Sindical Independiente de Funcionarios (CSIF) · Unión Provincial de Las Palmas
csif.desc: Support for internal and external communications at the provincial branch, producing and adapting informational pieces and video content. Writing and editing press releases and tailoring messages to different formats.

practices.desc: End-to-end support in communications and technical operations, drafting and layout of documents, press releases and social media management. Full data analysis cycle for reports and surveys (collection, cleaning and visualization) and translating regulations and calls into clear criteria. Active collaboration in internal coordination and with other entities.

degree.role: B.A. in Political Science and Public Administration
degree.desc: Methodologically and analytically intensive training. Focus on applied statistics and social research methods (quantitative and qualitative), combined with in-depth study of public management, political strategy and communication. Decision analysis, electoral behavior and public policy evaluation.
